system.notes:
Protection Rating is the wearer's Psy Rating multiplied by 9. Overload is equal to wearer's Psy Rating. Does nothing but look pretty if not a Psyker. 
If it ever overloads, must at some point within a day spend one hour in devout meditation to reinvigorate its powers. If not done it crumbles to dust.
